title: Wear Battery Watcher
summary: A way to check the battery of your phone from your wear device.
description: I noticed that, when my phone is across the room charging, there is no way to check it's battery percentage from my Android Wear Watch. This also gave me a good excuse to begin exploring the Android Wear APK. This app was meant to be educational and small, but let me know if there are any complaints / comments / improvements needed.
descriptionHTML:
I noticed that, when my phone is across the room charging, there is no way to check it's battery percentage from my Android Wear Watch. This also gave me a good excuse to begin exploring the Android Wear APK.

This app was meant to be educational and small, but let me know if there are any complaints / comments / improvements needed.
comments: This is exactly what I have been looking for.  An app that is not a FACE to show me my phones Battery%.  I can't count how many times my phone in in my pocket or bag while biking  or another room and I want to know if it needs charging.   Finally I can check my battery while riding my bike to see if I have enough to battery to stream music for the rest of my trip or if I need to stop streaming.  *small bug, sometimes it shows 0% battery and I have to close then re-open it to see actual percentage.
I've been looking for just thing for a long time. Thank you so much for making it! It said 0% when I first opened it, but when I reopened it, the correct status was displayed. Thanks again!
It would be nice if this actually worked... Most of the time it doesn't...
Simple app, does exactly what I want. Great job!
As advertised Does exactly what it says (and what I needed!)
A++ At first give it a few mins to sync
